mapper.insert: insert into lhcmember(lhc_id, lhc_pw, lhc_name, lhc_age, lhc_phone, lhc_addr, lhc_reg, lhc_sep)values(#{lhc_id},#{lhc_pw},#{lhc_name},#{lhc_age},#{lhc_phone},#{lhc_addr},sysdate,#{lhc_sep})
mapper.select: select count(*) from lhcmember where lhc_id=#{lhc_id} and lhc_pw=#{lhc_pw}
select lhc_pw from lhcmember where lhc_id=#{value}
mapper.update: update lhcmember set lhc_pw=#{lhc_pw}, lhc_phone=#{lhc_phone}, lhc_addr=#{lhc_addr} where lhc_id=#{lhc_id}
mapper.delete: delete from lhcmember where lhc_id=#{id} and lhc_pw=#{pw}
mapper.select: select lhc_id, lhc_pw, lhc_name, lhc_age,lhc_phone, lhc_addr,lhc_favorite, lhc_like, lhc_money, lhc_reg, lhc_sep, r from (select lhc_id, lhc_pw, lhc_name, lhc_age,lhc_phone, lhc_addr,lhc_favorite, lhc_like, lhc_money, lhc_reg, lhc_sep, rownum r from (select lhc_id, lhc_pw, lhc_name, lhc_age,lhc_phone, lhc_addr,lhc_favorite, lhc_like, lhc_money, lhc_reg, lhc_sep from lhcMember where lhc_sep = #{sep})) where r >= #{start} and r <= #{end}
select count(*) from lhcmember where lhc_sep = #{value}
mapper.update: update lhcMember set lhc_money = lhc_money + #{lhc_money} where lhc_id = #{lhc_id}
mapper.select: select lhc_like from lhcmember where lhc_id = #{value}
